root: ^As you proceed through the stars something catches the attention of crew and computer alike. A distortion in space where light is warped, bent, and trapped in the cosmic maw of a Wormhole.

^You and your crew watch as a nearby star is ripped from its position in the void and stretched into stellar spaghetti as it crosses the event horizon. A quick number crunch reveals that there is only a small chance that the same would happen to your ship should you choose to venture closer. Would you care to take a closer look?

Leave: ^While it is tantalizing to see just what lies beyond the Wormhole, you suppose that risking your cargo and crew over a passing interest wouldn’t be the best course of action. Besides, with how big the galaxy is chances are this won’t be the last Wormhole you’ll run into. You press on, wondering what could have been.
Propel: ^As you approach the umbral blot alarms start blaring. At this point, you can no longer safely pull back. The wormhole has begun to draw you in. In an instant, the entire ship and all aboard are enveloped by the void. Compressed infinitely by the massive gravity of the wormhole until the pressure is too much to bear. Just as fast as the ship had entered the wormhole it comes right back out, flung into the far reaches of space. To the surprise of no one, the ship sustained minor damage from breaking the laws of physics. But, to the surprise of everyone, it seems that you are now much closer to your destination.
Sent: ^As you approach the umbral blot alarms start blaring. At this point, you can no longer safely pull back. The wormhole has begun to draw you in. All retro-rockets are firing in an attempt to back out, but the gravity is too strong to resist. However, rather than being completely swallowed, the ship only skirts along the event horizon before managing to gain enough momentum to break free. Unfortunately, the momentum that freed the ship also caused it to fly back to where it came from. Overall, the little excursion with the wormhole damaged the ship and has only served to lengthen the journey ahead.
Pranked: ^As you approach the umbral blot alarms start blaring. At this point, you can no longer safely pull back. The wormhole has begun to draw you in. All retro-rockets are firing in an attempt to back out, but the gravity is too strong to resist. To the horror of those comprised of meat and bone, their bodies begin to stretch and distort due to the immense gravity. You watch as the ship and its inhabitants start to spaghettify and wonder if such warped cargo would still reach market price. In a last-ditch effort, you rout all power towards the engines and only barely manage to escape the event horizon. The ship has been mangled by the wormhole and suffered major damage. Those amongst your crew who remain unaffected are few and far between, the ship will have to operate at a limited capacity until more crew can be picked up. In the end, you press on. Content with the fact that nothing happened to your cargo.
Money: ^As you approach the umbral blot alarms start blaring. At this point, you can no longer safely pull back. The wormhole has begun to draw you in. In an instant, the ship is wrenched from its position in space into the center of the wormhole. The gravitational density only grows the longer the ship remains where it is. You believe that it won’t be long before the ship and everything inside is compressed into a singularity. But, that time never came. The ship was spat out of the wormhole just as fast as it had been swallowed. However, it wasn’t for nothing. Upon further inspection, you find that all the coal you have been carrying had been pressurized into diamonds. You continue on your journey with a new batch of cold hardened cash.
Shuffle: ^As you approach the umbral blot alarms start blaring. At this point, you can no longer safely pull back. The wormhole has begun to draw you in. The ship begins to spin wildly as you get closer to the wormhole, resulting in disorientation amongst all aboard. You are glad to have no internal organs as you watch your crew retch. When the spinning finally comes to a stop you realize that the wormhole is behind you now. The ship suffered no damage other than needing to be cleaned, but the resources in storage have been shuffled.
